body_html:
you'll need to implement your own encoder,
for decoder part, you could use tf provided ones : rnn_decoder or attention_decoder
in tf0.9, they are implemented in
lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/seq2seq.py
encoders already implemented in this file are good start points for implementing your own encoder.

encoders already implemented in this file are good start points for implementing your own encoder.
body:
you'll need to implement your own encoder,
for decoder part, you could use tf provided ones : rnn_decoder or attention_decoder
in tf0.9, they are implemented in 
lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/seq2seq.py
encoders already implemented in this file are good start points for implementing your own encoder.
